title: Are there any scholarships for executive education? - Quora
tags: College and University Scholarship and Fellowships

response.answer_text: In some cases. It depends on the industry and if there is a sponsoring company. One program we offer at my University is sponsored by a big bank and aimed at small businesses. Participants receive a scholarship for about 93% of the cost - enough to have some skin in the game but fundamentally inexpensive. I recommend you enquire with each university you are interested in as sometimes they might have incentives and support programs like the one I was mentioning.

My employer sponsored my Executive Education in Cambridge Judge Business School. When pursuing Executive Education programs, most of them are usually sponsored by your employer. Hence, you must obtain a reccomendation from a sponsoring executive or boss because this will be a mandatory requirement along with your application.
